channel.title: Quantum computing on The Encryption Compendium
channel.description: Recent content in Quantum computing on The Encryption Compendium

item.title: New Perspectives on the Future of Encryption
item.description: Published: May 2019 URL: https://www.lawfareblog.com/new-perspectives-future-encryption Abstract: Encryption and its effects on law enforcement’s access to data seem to occupy a perennial place in the headlines (and on Lawfare as well). The two of us have been working on it for years. The subject is often highly contested, but the fierce discussion has ignored some critical factors. One of those is how changing usage patterns and technologies will affect how law enforcement can—or can’t—obtain access.

item.title: The Search for Quantum-Resistant Cryptography: Understanding the Future Landscape
item.description: Authors: Sectigo Published: September 2019 URL: https://sectigo.com/newsroom/the-search-for-quantum-resistant-cryptography-understanding-the-future-landscape Abstract: To help enterprises prepare for the implications of quantum computing, Sectigo has created a broad set of 15 educational resources for security industry professionals in the form of a whitepaper, podcast episodes and transcriptions, and articles.
